title: Definitions
context: [§6K-2] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Commission&rdquo; means the Kahoolawe island reserve commission. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of land and natural resources. &ldquo;Island reserve&rdquo; means the area designated as the island of Kahoolawe and the submerged lands and waters extending seaward two miles from its shoreline. &ldquo;Waters&rdquo; means the area extending seaward two miles from the shoreline. [L 1993, c 340, pt of §2]
